name: spacepad
description: Spacepad is a self-hosted collaborative note-taking and whiteboard app. It offers real-time editing, sharing, and a flexible canvas for brainstorming and documentation.
features: Collaborative whiteboard: Creates shared canvas for brainstorming and diagramming.
Real-time editing: Sees changes from collaborators instantly.
Drawing tools: Provides pens, shapes, and text tools for visual creation.
Sticky notes: Adds virtual sticky notes for ideas and organization.
Infinite canvas: Expands workspace infinitely in all directions.
Image uploads: Imports images and screenshots onto canvas.
Export options: Saves boards as PNG, SVG, or PDF files.
Sharing links: Generates shareable links for collaboration.
Version history: Tracks changes and restores previous board states.
Templates: Starts with pre-made templates for common use cases.
Mobile support: Edits boards from tablets and smartphones.
Presentation mode: Presents boards in full-screen for meetings.
